sense.def:
To splash around in water
pomeni močno in glasno razburkati vodo, da škropi naokoli.

seg.quote: Ralph started to run, splashing through the shallow water.
They proceeded to hurl themselves about, splashing everybody within sight.

gramGrp.pos:
ERG VB
with
ADJUNCT
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
Kadar tekočina
splashes on something
, se po nečem razprši v številnih kapljicah.

seg.quote: Drenching spray splashed over the deck.
He stopped at a fountain to splash water over his face.
They flinched as the cold rain splashed them.

sense.def:
A splash
je zvok, ki nastane, kadar se nekaj dotakne vode.

seg.quote: She disappeared into the water with a splash.

sense.def:
A splash of a liquid
je majhna količina tekočine, ki se polije po nečem.

seg.quote: He wiped away the splash of gasoline on the near fender.

sense.def:
A splash of colour
je živobarvno območje.

seg.quote: A large bouquet of tulips made a brilliant splash of yellow on the table.

sense.def:
To splash out on a luxury
pomeni kupiti nekaj razkošnega, čeprav veliko stane;

seg.quote: We splashed out on a colour television.
